entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
